entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 7:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending before morning then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
